name: tarnation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to express anger or to add emphasis, to avoid saying "damnation": What in tarnation is that? I sure as tarnation ain't lookin' for no wife.
More examplesFewer examplesWhere in tarnation were you during all this commotion?I rushed down to get some sort of idea of what in tarnation I was supposed to be doing.There was a time when blurting out "Jesus Christ," "damnation" and the like were the ultimate no-nos. More acceptable euphemisms included "jeepers" for Jesus and "tarnation" for damnation.
